body_html:

body:
@terrytangyuan The error of hdf5_classification.py only occurs in the latest (20160530) nightly binaries. It works in my previous tensorflow.

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/sun/tensorflow/tensorflow/examples/skflow/hdf5_classification.py", line 46, in <module>
    classifier.fit(X_train, y_train)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/base.py", line 172, in fit
    monitors=monitors)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/estimator.py", line 433, in _train_model
    monitors=monitors)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/graph_actions.py", line 346, in train
    reraise(*excinfo)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/graph_actions.py", line 272, in train
    feed_dict = feed_fn() if feed_fn is not None else None
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/io/data_feeder.py", line 333, in _feed_dict_fn
    if len(self.X.shape) == 1 else self.X[batch_indices])
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/h5py/_hl/dataset.py", line 419, in __getitem__
    selection = sel.select(self.shape, args, dsid=self.id)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/h5py/_hl/selections.py", line 71, in select
    sel[arg]
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/h5py/_hl/selections.py", line 209, in __getitem__
    raise TypeError("PointSelection **getitem** only works with bool arrays")
**TypeError: PointSelection **getitem** only works with bool arrays**
